creditline: The Friends of Bruce Dayton Art Acquisition Fund
description: teardrop-shaped top; vertical rib down center on each side of blade, growing wider from tip to shaft; open loop at middle of shaft on each side; one side at bottom of shaft has an incised design with a standing stick figure holding a club or ax in PR hand; mottled patina--greens, reds, browns
title: Spearhead (mao)
